//Md. Ahsan Kabir Shohagh
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz 10005
#define pb(a) push_back(a)
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define fread freopen("input.txt","r",stdin)
#define fwrite freopen("output.txt","w",stdout)
#define inf (1<<30)
#define mem(abc,z) memset(abc,z,sizeof(abc))
#define PI acos(-1)
int n,m,k;
ll A[102][102],mxTime;
int par[205];
bool col[205];
bool dfs(int u)
{
    for(int i=0; i<m; i++)
    {
        int v=i;
        if(!col[v] && A[u][i]<=mxTime)
        {
            col[v]=true;
            if(par[v]==-1 || dfs(par[v]))
            {
                par[v]=u;
                return true;
            }
        }
    }
    return false;
}
bool bpm(ll val)
{
    mxTime=val;
    mem(par,-1);
    int cnt=0;
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
    {
        mem(col,false);
        if(dfs(i)) cnt++;
    }
    return cnt>=k;
}
int main()
{
    ll ans,low=1LL,high=1LL,mid;
    cin>>n>>m>>k;
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)
    {
        for(int j=0; j<m; j++)
        {
            cin>>A[i][j];
            high=max(high,A[i][j]);
        }
    }
    ans=1000000000000LL;
    //cout<<ans<<endl;
    while(low<=high)
    {
        mid=(low+high)>>1LL;
        if(bpm(mid))
        {
            high=mid-1LL;
            ans=min(ans,mid);
        }
        else low=mid+1LL;
    }
    cout<<ans<<endl;
    return 0;
}
/*
2 3 2
1 2 3
3 2 1
*/
